title: Quinn Russell on LinkedIn: Automate COVID-19 vaccine and test tracking with Nintex - Nintex
author: Quinn Russell
description: With the upcoming COVID-19 Federal tracking mandate about to go into a effect, we thought it'd be a good time resurface our free COVID-19 tracking solution...
cleaned_text: at Nintex - Improving the way people work through process management & automation With the upcoming COVID-19 Federal tracking mandate about to go into a effect, we thought it'd be a good time resurface our free COVID-19 tracking solution leveraging Nintex. Please feel free to check out the Nintex Gallery (corresponding links attached) to download for your use today. [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/danburke2?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image) Technical Presales Manager at Nintex In case you missed it, check out the webinar below for an out of the box COVID Vaccination tracking solution from [Nintex](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nintex?trk=public_post_reshare-text) using [#NintexWorkflowCloud](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fnintexworkflowcloud&trk=public_post_reshare-text). All workflows are available for free from the [Nintex](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nintex?trk=public_post_reshare-text) template gallery, and each can be easily customized to your specific business needs. If you're interested in a [#nocode](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fnocode&trk=public_post_reshare-text) [#automated](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fautomated&trk=public_post_reshare-text) [#workflow](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fworkflow&trk=public_post_reshare-text) solution for this or other business processes, check out the links or comment below.
